titlePart.text: SECTION H ELECTRICITY
GENERATION, CONVERSION, OR DISTRIBUTION OF ELECTRIC POWER
DYNAMO-ELECTRIC MACHINES
titlePart.entryReference: conversion of dc or ac input power into surge output power
microphones, pick-ups, telephone receivers, loud-speakers or other transmitters or receivers of sound or other mechanical waves

noteParagraph.text: Structural adaptation of the machine for the purposes of its control is in this sub-class, but controlling motors, generators, or converters, in general, is classified in sub-class .

titlePart.entryReference: channels or ducts in parts of the magnetic circuit ,
channels or ducts in or between conductors ,

titlePart.text: by ambient air flowing through the machine
having means for generating flow of cooling medium, e.g. having fan
with fan or impeller driven by the machine shaft
